name: chinese-copy-assistant
title: CJK Text Assistant
description: Improve the formatting of CJK text. Format text copied from PDFs or OCR, add whitespace between CJk characters and English characters, and more.
author: maxchang3

commands.name: improve-copied
commands.title: Improve Copied Text
commands.description: Improve text copied from a PDF or OCR.

preferences.name: transferEnglishPunctuationToChinese
preferences.title: 将英文标点转换为中文标点
preferences.description: 将英文标点转换为中文标点
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: transferChinesePunctuationToEnglish
preferences.title: 将中文标点转换为英文标点
preferences.description: 将中文标点转换为英文标点
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: removeSpacesBetweenNonEnglishLetters
preferences.title: 删除非英文字母间的空格
preferences.description: 删除非英文字母间的空格
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: addSpaceAfterEnglishPunctuation
preferences.title: 在标点符号后添加空格
preferences.description: 在标点符号后添加空格
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: deleteSpaceBetweenDotAndNumber
preferences.title: 删除小数点和数字之间的空格
preferences.description: 删除小数点和数字之间的空格
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: addSpacesBetweenEnglishLettersAndNumbers
preferences.title: 在字母与数字之间添加空格
preferences.description: 在字母与数字之间添加空格
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: deleteSpaceBetweenColonAndNumber
preferences.title: 删除冒号和数字之间的空格
preferences.description: 删除冒号和数字之间的空格
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: addWhiteOfPanGu
preferences.title: 规范中文排版（参考 https://sspai.com/post/37815 ）
preferences.description: 规范中文排版（参考 https://sspai.com/post/37815 ）
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: switchSimplifiedChineseToTraditionalChinese
preferences.title: 将简体中文转换为繁体中文
preferences.description: 将简体中文转换为繁体中文
preferences.label: 开启

preferences.name: switchTraditionalChineseToSimplifiedChinese
preferences.title: 将繁体中文转换为简体中文
preferences.description: 将繁体中文转换为简体中文
preferences.label: 开启

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
